intro:
How close to the edge must one go for the best content?
Now is the time to hone your HOLODAMA and capture the audience's attention!
description:
This very night, in the world of VTubers where rivalries abound, a live stream program featuring Hololive talents shall begin once again.
It is the talents' ability to capture the perfect footage, the most streamable content, the most viral-worthy meme... It is the ability to draw the attention of a diverse fanbase and bring them enjoyment.
People call such ability the HOLODAMA (opinions may vary).

HOLODAMA refers to the ability to find and capture high-quality content during a stream while confronted with a variety of risky situations.
A collection of mini ""chicken"" games, so to speak.

This game contains multiple mini-games starring Hololive talents.
For the ultra-competitive, see if you can conquer the Crazy Endurance global leaderboards,
which are split into monthly and all-time rankings!

Multiplayer for up to four players is also available.
This is your chance to challenge your friends and family in a heated battle of content creation.


◆Mini-Games Featuring Hololive Talents
""Stop a carriage as close to the cliff as possible and reach the castle""
 (Player: Hoshimachi Suisei)
""Load as much treasure as possible into a pirate ship without dropping anything into the sea""
 (Player: Houshou Marine)
""Prank someone well enough to get them moderately freaked out, then reveal the prank""
 (Players: Shirakami Fubuki & Nakiri Ayame)
All those mini-games and more (16 in all) for you to capture the perfect stream with!
Each session is a random selection of 5 mini-games. Aim for the highest score!

◆Enjoy thrilling live stream battles in multiplayer mode!
In multiplayer mode, two to four players can battle it out with each other amidst laughter and tears.
You never know what can go wrong in a live stream...but fortune (and high scores) favors the brave!
Let's see who's the better live streamer among family, friends, or fellow Hololive fans!

◆Conquer the World in Crazy Endurance Mode!
Once all mini-games have been unlocked, you gain access to Crazy Endurance mode, which pits you against the rest of the world.
Keep aiming to get that Crazy score in this mode that's tailor-made for endurance streaming.
See where you stand among the best in the world!
